name: HIND WELFARE FOUNDATION
briefDescription: HWF endeavour all work for poor people without discrimination of cast creed or faith. thus we work for inclusive development namely Education for all,  Medical camp and assistance for all, moral building through sports and competition, Elimination of poverty through skill development, Leadership development among Youth. Presently due to poor financial status we could not have  paid office Staff. All work is handled by our Trustees and Members assigned volunterily. So that we could work as much as possible in the crisping finance.
